Package com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.common

Class CustomCellFormat

java.lang.Object
com.ansi.scilla.common.ApplicationObject
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.common.CustomCellFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CustomCellFormat
extends com.ansi.scilla.common.ApplicationObject
A generic table cell formatting object that we can use to create a formatter for XLS, PDF or HTML.
Author:
dclewis
See Also:
